QuestData.Title: Ishaal's Orb
QuestData.Description: The Adherents came for me, but I was already hiding. I watched from the shadows as they ransacked my hut.$B$BThen I watched the Shattered Hand orcs arrive and butcher them like dinner fowl. Seems everyone is after us these days.$B$BOne of those orc thugs made off with my scrying orb. I will be needing it back if I am to be of any use to Iskar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Ishaal's Orb from Camp Thornscar.
QuestData.RewardText: Hmm... something's not right. She's been tampered with.$B$BSomeone else has used my orb to enter the realm of shadows.
